    • saveSolution

      public Solution saveSolution(SolutionDTO solutionDTO, Quest quest, User user)
      Description copied from interface: SolutionServiceInterface
      Creates a new Solution entity and sets its values according to the DTO, sets Quest and User, then persists it.
      Specified by:
      saveSolution in interface SolutionServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      solutionDTO - the SolutionDTO which will be saved into the database as Solution
      quest - the quest for which the solution has been written
      user - the user who wrote the solution
      Returns:
      the Solution object saved into the database
